_meta.validation_status: partially validated — $5/100x100mm/2L/5pc confirmed; other entries estimated
_meta.note: Estimate based on published rates as of 2026-02 — verify at pcbway.com
pricing_notes: PCBWay uses a dynamic quote calculator — prices are indicative.
$5 for 100x100mm, 2-layer, HASL-LF, 5 pcs is a confirmed published anchor price.
Boards ≤100x100mm fall in the cheapest area tier (same unit price as smaller boards).
Boards >110mm on either axis move to higher area tiers (~2-3x cost).
No separate tooling fee — embedded in prototype pricing.
Assembly: ~$0.002 per solder joint. Starting from $29 for 1-20 piece runs.
Payment method can affect price by ±5-10%.
Express 24H available for 1-2 layer only; 48H for 4-layer (with size/qty restrictions).
All prices in USD. Convert to GBP at runtime using Redis fx:USD_GBP key.

assembly_notes: SMT, THT, and mixed assembly available. No tooling fee. BOM must be validated against JLCPCB/PCBWay component library before quoting assembly.

lead_times.express_notes: 24H for 1-2 layer only. 48H for 4-layer (limited specs). Payment must be confirmed before 18:00 CST.

enig.label: ENIG (Electroless Nickel Immersion Gold)
enig.notes: Flat $5 surcharge for prototype quantities. Higher for larger orders.

osp.label: OSP (Organic Solderability Preservative)
osp.notes: Similar cost to HASL-LF. Short shelf life.

assembly_pricing.notes: Assembly quote requires BOM. Request via pcbway.com/quotesmt.aspx for accurate pricing.

price_table.ref_spec: 2-layer, HASL Lead-Free, 1oz copper, 1.6mm FR4, standard lead time (7 days), USD
price_table.interpolation_notes: For boards ≤100x100mm use the 100x100mm entry (same tier). For boards >100mm on either axis, scale linearly by area from the nearest larger reference entry. Apply layer_multipliers and surface_finish surcharges on top.

entries.label: 100x100mm
entries.validation_note: qty_5 = $5.00 confirmed from pcbway.com published prototype pricing
